description: Number of ways to factor n into distinct factors with one level of parentheses.
comments: Each "part" in parentheses is distinct from all others at the same level. Thus (3*2)*(2) is allowed but (3)*(2*2) and (3*2*2) are not.a(n) depends only on prime signature of n (cf. A025487). So a(24) = a(375) since 24 = 2^3*3 and 375 = 3*5^3 both have prime signature (3,1).
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Oct 15 1999
